title: Digital Human Look Development Artist
summary: Apple's Synthetic Data Group provides content for developing real-time on-device Computer Vision and Machine Perception technologies across Apple products. We are looking for a world-class character look development artist to help us achieve the highest levels of photorealism in our digital human content. The ideal candidate will flourish in a fast-paced, dynamic research environment while continually improving quality and reusability. Contribute to generation of synthetic data used to develop software solutions which will enable Apple’s next generation products.
description: Leverage your experience in character look development to model, groom, create shaders and materials that will generalize to a diverse range of photorealistic digital human content. You will work in a cross-functional team providing synthetic data to develop innovative computer vision and machine learning algorithms.
key_qualifications:
7+ years experience working with techniques and technologies for CG rendering and character look development in feature film, VFX, and/or games
Excellent ability to discern and manipulate light, shade, color, and intricate details to create physically-based, photorealistic material models
Extensive knowledge and experience on creating photorealistic digital humans, including modeling, look dev, body and facial rigging, cloth, and hair
Expertise in Maya with crafting advanced shading networks for the creation of photorealistic, physically-based materials
Highly proficient in painting 2d textures in Photoshop, and 3D texture painting in Mari, Substance 3D painter, and/or ZBrush
Solid understanding working with V-Ray or other ray trace renderers
Ability to scale work to large numbers of diverse digital content while maintaining quality
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
education_experience: BA/BFA in Digital Media/Visual Effects/Animation or equivalent industry experience
additional_requirements:
Please Provide portfolio of your work.
Developing synthetic data content for machine learning, and computer vision is a big bonus
Python scripting is beneficial
Familiarity with photogrammetry
Self managed, self motivated, and able to learn new pipeline and procedures
Experience working with external art teams and outsource vendors
Strong leadership and mentoring abilities and interpersonal skills
Ability to find creative solutions for technically challenging tasks
Exposure to Agile development methodologies
